entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A ghost who is a former student of Hogwarts. He is mentioned as having a bored voice and being able to see Peeves's lack of subtlety.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: A poltergeist who lacks subtlety according to Nearly Headless Nick. He is not physically present in the scene but his behavior is described by Nick.

entities.name: bloody baron
entities.description: A person mentioned as someone Harry might be able to find and ask for help.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is walking up to the Owlery. He has training later on the Quidditch pitch.

entities.name: owlery
entities.description: A location where owls are kept. Harry is walking towards it.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: The caretaker's cat who brushes against Harry's ankles and disappears behind a statue of Wilfred the Wistful.

entities.name: wilfred the wistful
entities.description: A person mentioned as being depicted in a statue. Mrs Norris disappears behind this statue.

relationships.description: Nick mentions that Peeves lacks subtlety.
Harry is trying to find the Bloody Baron who might be able to put a stop to something.
Harry is walking up to the Owlery.
Mrs Norris disappears behind a statue of Wilfred the Wistful.
Harry will be back on the Quidditch pitch for training later.
